featured.text: And in 1994, Microsoft CEO (chief executive officer) Bill Gates paid $30.8 million for a handwritten notebook penned by Leonardo da Vinci.

other.text: The new design was not considered necessary for officers to own. 44.

definition.en_def: A person holding a position of authority or command in an organization, especially in the military or police.
definition.example: The officer gave instructions to the team before the operation.
